programme.title: Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The Cowboy Way - Drone'T Knock It 'Til You Try It: A ranching job in Texas inspires Cody to try and modernize their business with the help of technology, but Booger and Bubba are hesitant that it will be successful. Booger visits Matthew's school during parent's week to teach his classmates about cowboying. Bubba struggles with being away from his family for work and feels the pressure to keep their business close to home. A life-changing opportunity for Booger to compete at a world-renowned colt-starting competition leaves Cody and Bubba excited for their friend, but nervous about what it will mean for their business.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.desc: Handcrafted America - Sgrafitto Ceramics, Wood Tables and Steampunk Lamps: Host Jill Wagner travels the country on a quest to find talented craftsmen who still make incredible items by hand. First, in Lambertville, New Jersey, Jill visits the studio of ceramicist Katherine Hackl to learn the technique of sgraffito, the scratching of intricate patterns into the surface of pottery. Then, she's off to Kenosha, Wisconsin, where she meets Martin Antaramian, a young woodworker who is creating solid wood tables that look as if they are made of swirling fabric. Finally, she heads to Farmington, Minnesota, to see how lamp maker Shawn Carling turns castaway machine parts into hip, nostalgic lamps.

programme.title: State Plate
programme.desc: State Plate - Utah: Host Taylor Hicks gets a little salty when State Plate heads to Utah. First, he heads 5000 feet underground and jumps into the “worlds' biggest salt grinder” to mine the purest salt in the country. From there he starts his plate with a savory salt-crusted beef tenderloin. Next, Taylor goes for three side dishes that shout family and flavor. He discovers the many ways you can prepare Utah's official snack: Jell-O. Then he shares the secret behind the state's famous fry-sauce. And what in the world are funeral potatoes? Taylor finds a comforting casserole that's simply to die for. Finally, he feels the heat as he learns how to preserve Utah's celebrated cherry crop, and treats himself to tart cherry cookies that are simply divine.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown - The Ultimate Cowboy: Bigger in Texas: Season two of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown kicks off with the arrival of fourteen real-life cowboys to the sprawling Texas ranch where they'll call home until only one remains. As they set up camp in the sweltering heat, they make their introductions and size up the competition. While getting better acquainted, personalities clash, and alliances form. In the first of many challenges, the cowboys work in teams to sort gold-tagged cattle from a mixed herd. When miscommunication affects a team's performance, they have to answer to Trace. After consulting with two expert judges, Trace eliminates the team member who didn't pull their weight. As the eliminated contestant hits the trail, the remaining thirteen breathe a sigh of relief and prepare for the next challenge.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: Into The Wild Frontier - Joe Meek: Cunning Captive: A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: Wild West Chronicles - The Texas Fence-Cutting War: When homesteaders keep cutting down her fences to access grazing land and water, a widowed landowner teams up with famed Texas Ranger Ira Aten to protect her property. Aten hopes his explosive plan of action will force the cutters to compromise.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: Wild West Chronicles - Battle Beneath the Mountain: For months, a thin wall of rock is all that keeps the peace between two rival silver mining companies 300 feet below the Idaho desert. When the barrier is finally breached, pickaxes give way to pistols and rifles, and the miners battle for five days.

programme.title: Cowboy Way
programme.desc: The Cowboy Way - Is It a Boy or a Girl?: Before heading out for the day's work, Bubba notices one of his colts is missing, and the guys go searching for the young horse before it is injured. At the urging of his grandmother, Booger ventures into the world of Internet dating, hoping to find a serious girlfriend. After Bubba's trusted horse gets sick, he asks Booger to help him break in a new colt. Cody and Misty finally find out if they are having a little cowboy or cowgirl, and they plan a party to reveal the gender to friends and family.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May test the Aston Martin Rapide, the Porsche Panamera Turbo and the Maserati Quattroporte as they attempt to find the world's greatest four seat supercar. Meanwhile, Richard is on the test track in two very different muscle cars, the Chevrolet Camaro SS and Mercedes E63 AMG, and there's a double dose of celebrity as Harry Potter star Rupert Grint and F1 ace Rubens Barrichello take their turns as the stars in the Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May attempt to build cool and interesting motorhomes before setting off for a Bank Holiday weekend in the West Country to see how each of their creations performs in the real world. programme.title: Top Gear

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May buy old British roadsters from Jensen-Healey, Lotus and TVR before taking a wistful journey through the remnants of this country's sports car industry, starting in Norfolk and ending up at the mothballed TVR factory in Blackpool. Also in this show, Jeremy is on the test track in the sensational new Ferrari 458 Italia and laid back Hollywood legend Jeff Goldblum is the star in the new Reasonably Priced Car.

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: The Top Gear boys are once again let loose in the USA, this time for an epic road trip up the east coast. Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are comparing the Mercedes SLS, the Porsche 911 GT3 RS and the Ferrari 458 Italia. programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Every stage is an exciting adventure with your newborn. As babies grow, they absorb a wide variety of sights and sounds. And with so much to see and hear, infants seem to enjoy, and be most soothed by, gentle sounds such as your voice or pleasant, restful music. Treat your child -- and yourself -- to the delights of Baby Bach Musical Adventure, an award-winning program that exposes babies to the joy and majesty of classical music while presenting them with stimulating, colorful images.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As each day passes, babies' awareness of the world around them -- and all the wonders it holds -- continues to develop. Wild animals are especially intriguing and World Animals captures the spirtit of little ones' fascination with wild creatures as it introduces them to animals living in the jungle, in the ocean, and on the savannah.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As babies develop, their understanding of the world, and how its pieces "fit" together, continues to progress. DISCOVERING SHAPES playfully introduces five basic forms circle, oval, triangle, square and rectangle as each appears in the context of toys, nature and everyday objects.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Take your little explorer on an exotic musical expedition to meet wild animals from across the globe. Journey to the jungle, savannah, desert and forest.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Share a rainbow of sights and sounds with your baby as you discover the wonders of color together! Join puppet host "Vincent Van Goat" as he creates six Van Gogh masterpieces exploring red, green, blue, yellow, orange, and purple. World Of Colors is a spirited celebration of creative expression.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Within the first year of babies' lives, their physical development begins to kick into high gear as they explore ways to physically interact with the world around them. BABY'S FIRST MOVES is a joyful celebration of their movement milestones -- including first steps, clapping, jumping, dancing and more.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Babies love animals, and now you can bring animals from the seven continents home to your baby. Meet dozens of exotic animals including Asian pandas, Australian kangaroos and Arctic snow monkeys...all filmed in their beautiful, natural habitats. Rhythms and songs inspired by faraway lands have been orchestrated especially for little ears and encourage your baby to sing, dance and play to the world beats. You'll laugh together at the funny puppet shows featuring moms and their baby animals.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As babies turn one year old, they continue to develop their communication skills. Meanwhile, with you as their guide, they also begin to explore the world beyond their front door. Baby's Favorite Places presents them with a playful introduction to 20 words for the names of familiar locations from the market, to the library, to the local park.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Within a baby's first year of life, new experiences can transform what might otherwise seem to be ordinary events into exciting opportunities for imaginative play. Baby Neptune exposes little ones to the wonders of water in their world -- whether they're stomping in the rain, splashing in the bathtub, playing "catch me if you can" with the tide on the beach, or "meeting" the fascinating creatures that live in rivers, lakes and oceans.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As babies develop, their understanding of the world, and how its pieces "fit" together, continues to progress. DISCOVERING SHAPES playfully introduces five basic forms circle, oval, triangle, square and rectangle as each appears in the context of toys, nature and everyday objects.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As babies grow, their eye-hand coordination begins to improve as their ability to interact with their surroundings blossoms. It is the perfect time for My First Signs, A playful introduction to 20 common words and phrases from baby's world -- including ''mommy'', ''daddy'' and ''I love you'' -- both Spoken and in Sign Language.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Between 12 and 24 months, little ones become increasingly interested in more complex ideas and begin to explore numbers and counting. Numbers Nursery introduces little ones to numerals 1 through 5 in a captivating, interactive way that invites them to join in, clap their hands and count out loud.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Baby Mozart is an introduction to Mozart's beautiful music, which has been proven to have positive affects on people of all ages, especially babies. Images of brightly colored toys and known objects aid in the audio presentation of child-friendly arrangements and sound effects.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies play a slide game before watching Becky and Jed look for eggs on their farm. Then their mum cooks them for their tea. In Teletubbyland, the Lion and Bear play their hide and seek game.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Alex Pascall and some children sing to their dolls to rock them to sleep. Laa-Laa wants to sing a lovely song, but Tinky Winky is crunching his Tubby Toast too loudly!

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies march up and down a hill and then they watch some children explore the colour pink. Tinky Winky doesn't know how to make Tubby Custard.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop tries to convince to BJ and Riff that she had seen an elephant in the park. Barney introduces Riff of the best deaf musicians of all time - Beethoven.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: It's fun and games with Barney and his friends! BJ's favorite way of getting exercise is by playing sports and games. When Baby Bop is shy about trying new games, Barney and his friends show her how tee-rific trying something new can be.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney helps his friends discover just how fun numbers can be by taking them on a number hunt in the park. Baby Bop delights in sharing her favorite number and the kids discover that numbers can be found everywhere. With Barney and his friends, you can always count on a fun day!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Picture this! When Barney shows off his new painting, his friends are inspired to create their own art show. Discovering how to create new colors and draw shapes, Barney and his friends put on a super-dee-duper art show

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Barney's friends are playing a fun game of "I Can Do" where they each share something they can do. When BJ suggests having an "I Can Do" show, Baby Bop becomes worried. Barney shows Baby Bop that while trying something new can sometimes be scary, with help from family and friends, it can also be fun!

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Welcome to the neighborhood! Anna has just moved to the neighborhood and is missing her old friends. Barney and his friends help her discover that moving is an adventure with new places to explore and new friends to meet.

programme.title: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Safety first! After learning about fire safety when a firefighter visits the caboose, Barney and his friends are inspired to do a little "safety inspection" of their own. Baby Bop helps her teddy bear take a bath, BJ's accident shows why you should only skate outside, and saying "be careful" is a good way to tell someone how much you love them!

programme.title: Barney and Friends

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Lemon and Raspberry's fashion podcast is saved by Apple, then almost sabotaged by Sweet and Sour when Lemon's "mood hair" runs amok, acting like the bickering twins, and the twins' comical argument is accidentally broadcast on the "berrynet."

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When Sour wishes she could have a birthday all her very own, her twin sister Sweet grants her wish by forgoing celebrating her birthday. But what begins as a day that Sour has always dreamed of quickly becomes a disappointment when she misses her twin. With Strawberry's help, Sour gives her birthday back to Sweet with a special surprise.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When a comedy of errors causes Orange, Plum and Cherry to arrive late to their campout, they start off their annual tradition of telling tall-tales around the campfire.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: At the girls' campout, Sour launches into a whopper of a yarn about the adventures she and Sweet had in the "Berry Deep Dark Forest." She tries to get Sweet to participate in spinning the tale, but Sour's over-the-top performance leaves Sweet behind. Toward the end, Sour graciously changes the story to pull Sweet into it, giving Sweet the opportunity to toss in an ad lib that makes a nice topper to Sour's story.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Apple's rave review on her berryweb page of Strawberry's new dessert starts a booming mail order dessert business for Berry Bitty City. When Strawberry's stuffed-up nose makes her bake a bad-tasting cake, Apple, afraid the truth will hurt Strawberry's reputation, proclaims it's delicious. The fib snowballs when the Queen of Berryvania reads Apple's review and orders Strawberry's new cake for her ball.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Sour teasing Apple escalates into a "prank war" between the two of them. After the girls' feud disrupts the town, they are sentenced in a Berry Bitty City-style trial to camp alone together for a whole weekend. Miraculously, they emerge best buds, and their friends are relieved, until Sour's influence on Apple turns her into a mini-Sour, and they have to do a personality "makeover" on Apple.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Berrykin Bloom's braggart cousin, Berrykin Bertram, has won the hot sauce competition at the local county fair year after year.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When Apple feels left out of a Berryball game and an advanced ballet class, she invents some "groove booties" programmed to dance to any beat. She temporarily impresses her friends with her dance moves, but when the groove booties go out of control and threaten the town's Berryball game, she is forced to fess up.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: When the girls discover that Apple's groove booties can teach the pups to dance, Plum gets an idea for a Doggie Dance Show. Wanting to impress them, Huck offers to have TomTom join the show... despite the pup's obvious dislike of performing in public. It's up to Strawberry to help Huck see that he should not force TomTom into something he just doesn't want to do.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: Strawberry and Orange are dangling their legs in the stream when something tickles Orange's foot. She is sent squealing from the water, certain an eel is after her. Strawberry good-naturedly chuckles at her antics. But Orange gets her dander up and wades into the water to face her "attacker." When she looks down into the water, gazing up at her is the cutest, most adorable, puffy-cheeked fish she's ever seen. It's love at first sight. Orange has to take him home.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: At the next Storytime, Strawberry is going to read a new poem. We see her at the podium as she finishes writing it, one afternoon when no one else is in the café except Custard and Pupcake. Strawberry clears her throat and reads the poem aloud. It's a simple, sweet rhyme about the magic of making wishes on falling stars. She tries a few different rhymes as she goes, noting them on her paper. She is startled to hear applause from Mr. Longface Caterpillar who has heard her recital.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: From the BerryWorks to Strawberry's Café, everyone is excited about who will win this year's Spring Flower Festival! Berry Bitty City is decorated with colorful banners proclaiming the big event. Lemon works the hardest. For weeks she has watered her violets by day and sung to them at night, doing everything she can to win first prize. With the contest just a day away, Lemon is at her garden early.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake
programme.desc: After an accidental wager with Purple Pieman, Strawberry sets off to prove that she can go around the world in 80 days.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake

programme.title: Jason Vlogs

programme.title: Ryan's World

programme.title: Ryan's World

programme.title: Jason Vlogs
programme.desc: Jason and his family learn to play together in this special that's full of family fun and games for kids!

programme.title: The Last Hope
programme.desc: When the Ninjas' attempt to return Garmadon's ‘Helmet of Darkness' to its perch at the Celestial Clock in order to prevent the final battle between Lloyd and his father from beginning fails, a Super Weapon is created that can destroy all of Ninjago. With the Overlord and Garmadon nearing completion of the Super-Weapon, Misako tells the group she thinks there could be one last chance at preventing Lloyd's final battle with his father. She believes if they can steal the helmet off Garmadon's head and return it to it's rightful perch on the Celestial Clock, it could stop the clock before it reaches zero, thus preventing the final battle from beginning. Dressed as Warriors, the Ninja escort their ‘captive' Misako to Garmadon, and the heroes see glimpses of the Super-Weapon being built. In a thrilling escape, Misako cleverly steals Garmadon's helmet, and they race to the Celestial Clock. Lloyd has a brief encounter with his father, and hesitates striking him. When they return the helmet to its rightful perch, they're one second too late, allowing the clock to reach zero, and for it to focus a beam of concentrated light from the sky into the Super-Weapon. Nya is taken hostage, as the others fall off a cliff, barely surviving the fall. The Ninja have failed -- the final battle has begun.

programme.title: Thunderstox
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox encounters the sculptor. He helps unleash a horde of fierce garden gnomes on Knighton. What will the NEXO KNIGHTS do against this new enemy? Will their new COMBO NEXO Powers do the trick? As Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox head off on the Evil Mobile to 'store' the Forbidden Power in a secret location, they encounter…THE SCULPTOR. His real name is ROBERTO ARNOLDI. He's a sensitive and odd artist who has been laid off by the king (the King ordered a "smashing" statue of the Queen, and the Sculptor made a statue of the Queen literally smashing monsters. He takes everything very literally.) Jestro instructs him to make a "bad" statue that he can use to attack the knights. The Sculptor sets to work. Meanwhile, the NEXO KNIGHTS are discussing the COMBO NEXO Powers, the Forbidden Powers, and what all this means. Lance, meanwhile, decides that since his talk show career is on hold, he thinks he'll install cameras in the Fortrex and do a Big Brother-like expose show on the Knights (he decides NOT to tell the others.) Merlok 2.0 and the Cloud of Monstrox (each talking to their cohorts) explain the history of the Forbidden Powers: it's a history lesson about the WIZARDS' COUNCIL, the Forbidden Powers, and how they were stopped long ago. This visual montage leads Jestro to…MOUNT THUNDERSTROX. The Cloud of Monstrox shows him the circle of ten Standing Stones where he will insert the Forbidden Powers. "What'll happen after that?” asks Jestro, curious. "Oh, I don't want to spoil the surprise," says the Cloud. They insert the first Forbidden Power, Relentless Rust, and it locks into place on its stone. They go off to battle the Knights and collect the "bad" statue the sculptor is making. But he's made a literally bad statue…it's terrible ... garden gnomes. Like an amateur art student. And…it's not even finished. ("You can't rush bad genius!") The Knights attack with their newly modified vehicles and they succeed in destroying the Evil Mobile. They then try to use a COMBO NEXO Power, but can't…it had to be perfect to work (Ava and Merlok need to work on it.) As Jestro and the Cloud retreat, Merlok again talks to Clay about turning to stone! Merlok calls in Robin…he will need him to build something to help Clay as he becomes more and more impaired.

programme.title: Return Of The Overlord
programme.desc: When Garmadon uses his new Super-Weapon to turn Jamakai Village evil, he unwittingly unsettles the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possesses his body. Lord Garmadon witnesses the Super-Weapon come to life, revealing it to be ‘Garma-Tron', a giant moving cannon. His first test subject is Nya. Meanwhile, the heroes prepare for the final battle and sneak-attack Garmadon's compound…only to find it empty. The Super-Weapon is moving towards the coastline, where the cannon's range can reach Ninjago. On the way there, the Ninja must face off with Evil Nya, turned dark from the Super-Weapon. On the coastline, Lloyd battles his father atop Garma-Tron. The battle is fierce, but Lloyd fails at stopping his father from firing Garma-Tron, turning Jamanakai Village evil. Garmadon naively celebrates, not realizing he's undone the balance, allowing the spirit of the Overlord to cross over and possess his body. And as the Overlord continues to get more powerful, a hideous metamorphosis is taking place. Lloyd must fight the Overlord, and just when it looks like good will prevail, Lloyd is injured and thrown to the ground. In the end, the villains escape through a portal to Ninjago, and our heroes are abandoned on the island with no way home. And with the Green Ninja injured, it looks like all is lost. Evil has won.

programme.title: Rotten Luck
programme.desc: Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox unleashes the Forbidden Power Ravaging Rot on Knighton! Turning everything into green gooey rot. But Robin has an awesome new invention that could help the NEXO KNIGHTS Jestro and the Cloud of Monstrox find a second Forbidden Power near the falling down Swamp Castle: RAVAGING ROT. With this power, they can make everything in the kingdom rot – food, vegetation, anything that grows or is natural. And that's exactly what they do! It's awful and makes everything stink. The Sculptor start to sculpt a portable HeadQuarter for his master, Jestro. Jestro expects it to be done when they return from ravaging the land. Axl is very concerned – he's into organic food ... and now food starts to rot. Merlok 2.0 and Ava are continuing to work on perfecting the COMBO NEXO Powers. We see display screens of MANY of the NEXO Powers. But there's a huge power consumption issue with these new-fangled combos. “I'll have to find an algorithmic power curve consumption solution, magic man,” says Ava. “I always just sort of choose them by, uh, feel.” “What do you feel like?” “Uh, a ham sandwich, a banana, and dragon fire,” responds Merlok. “That produced a combo with 2% efficiency,” says Ava. “This is why we have to actually THINK about and study perfec Combos. We need automatic power integration.” The Knights must stop Jestro from rotting all the food and living plant matter in Knighton and Axl leads the charge. But as they finally confront Jestro, who's trying to rot a field of beans near Fruitbridge, they're hit by his finally completed ROLLING HQ (the Sculptor is proud of the “artsy” elements.) … it's not exactly perfect though … he took the idea of Head Quarter a little too litteral and created a big head. Finally, in this conclusive battle where the knights get strapped on a rotting bridge, Clay emerges in a sleek, new BATTLE SUIT that Robin built for him because he was starting to have trouble moving around (the whole turning to stone thing.) It's smaller and more high-tech than the bigger Mechs of the past. Clay's able to drive Jestro off. Jestro, at the end of the episode, puts the Forbidden Power of Ravaging Rot into Mount Thunderstrox. Meanwhile, back at the Fortrex, Axl makes an organic food feast for all his fellow Knights.

programme.title: Rise Of The Snakes
programme.desc: The four Ninja are snapped out of their post-hero complacency when Lord Garmadon's young son Lloyd shows up and tries to pick up where his father left off. The Ninja dismiss him as a threat, but regret that choice after Lloyd wakes up the evil snake tribe. A prophecy is revealed that states a green ninja will ultimately defeat Lord Garmadon.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: When Jestro the Jester finds the Book of Monsters, chaos breaks loose in the Kingdom of Knighton. Can the newly graduated Knights from the Knights' Academy save the kingdom? It's final graduation fighting exams for the latest Knights from Knights' Academy. All our new Knights demonstrate their prowess: CLAY, AARON, AXL and LANCE. PRINCESS MACY get to join them, but her father doesn't want her to graduate. As part of the entertainment, MERLOK does an amazing magic trick. His act is followed by…JESTRO, the King's Jester. He's terrible (and he should know to never follow a better act.) Everyone laughed because he's a real joke....a total failure. While Jestro roams the halls fo the King's Castle, forlorn, he hears the BOOK OF MONSTERS calling to him from Merlok's library. The book talks Jestro into gathering as many books of spells as he can carry, but they're interrupted by...Clay! As Jestro quickly pages through the Book of Monsters to attack Clay, Merlok arrives. There's a battle in the library between Jestro and Merlok. Finally, the wizard summons up his most powerful spell in self-defence. BOOM! There's a big, magical explosion and when Clay forces his way back into the library, Merlok, Jestro and the magic books are...GONE!

programme.title: New Girl in Town
programme.desc: When the World Petacular comes to Heartlake City and is almost ruined before it's even started, five feisty girls unite, despite their differences, using their creativity to save the day. Best friends Olivia, Andrea, Emma, Mia and Stephanie reside in HeartLake City but didn't know each other - that is until the World Petacular brought them together! On the eve of the biggest event Heartlake City hosts, disaster and chaos is abound. New-in-town Olivia is helping her veterinarian Aunt Sophie with her mobile clinic. But when she's put in charge of training a scruffy puppy named Scarlet, the puppy runs amuck, leaving a trail of destruction as she collides with Andrea, ruins Emma's banner and Stephanie's cakes, and finally spooks Mia's horse Bella who bucks Mia off and sprints away. The girls quickly unite, helping each-other to save the day and most importantly have fun along the way!

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Back in training mode with the looming threat of Lloyd and the Hypnobrai, Zane wanders after a Falcon and lands himself in a heap of trouble. The rest of the Ninja leave the training dojo to help him and return to find that the snakes have burned it to the ground.

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 2
programme.desc: Realizing they must defend the Kingdom from Jestro's monsters, the Knights try to organize but are despondent when they discover their best advisor – Merlok the Magician – has sacrificed himself to save them. When Jestro awakens, he's been blasted miles and miles away from the King's Castle by Merlok's explosive spell. And, it seems, all the books he was trying to steal have been scattered, too. The Book of Monsters broke Jestro' fall and now he can use the book to attack the people who laughed at him. Meanwhile, the King and his newly-trained Knights pick through the rubble of Merlok's library. They'll have to figure something out, because Jestro and his newly made magic monsters attack King's Castle! Clay organizes the Knights to defend the kingdom, but they've never worked together before. It takes all their training, plus the help of an old friend…MERLOK! Only now he's MERLOK 2.0. Ava has been piecing together what happened and discovering that the “ghost in the machine” she's been chasing is really Merlok in digital form. Now, he can use his magic digitally and he downloads just the right weapons to the struggling Knights! They finally foil Jestro's attack with Merlok's help and officially become NEXO KNIGHTS!

programme.title: Stephanie's Surprise Party
programme.desc: When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they soon discover that it's not easy keeping their plans secret from Stephanie who becomes suspicious when none of the girls have time to hang out. When Emma, Olivia, Andrea and Mia plan a surprise party for Stephanie's birthday, they discover that it's not easy keeping their plans a secret. As the girls choreograph a dance routine, magic show and search for the perfect present and cake, Stephanie becomes aware that her friends are avoiding her on her birthday and excluding her from their activities... Little does she know that her friends are secretly preparing a surprise pool party for her! Once the surprise is revealed Stephanie realises how much her friends care about her and the importance of friendship.

programme.title: Snakebit
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe – The Fangpyres – to help him regain control. The Ninja are busy setting up their new HQ that Zane discovered, but are called to duty when the Fangpyres attack the village where Jay's family lives.

programme.title: The Power Of Merlok
programme.desc: When Jestro attacks a village on the far side of the Kingdom, the NEXO-Knights wonder how they'll get there. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RV…maybe they can “mod” that for their own, “knightly” use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rolling…in THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. “Of course I'm the leader…I'm a Richmond.”

programme.title: Dolphin Cruise
programme.desc: Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a science contest at school and win a trip on a luxury yacht but not everything goes as planned when they set out to sea. When Olivia, Stephanie, Andrea, Mia and Emma enter a school science contest and win a Dolphin sight-seeing trip, not everything goes to plan...As the girls set out to sea on a luxury yacht, misunderstandings and disagreements occur which become secondary when they discover a pod of dolphins in danger. The girls learn that they have to compromise and trust in each other if they are to save the dolphins and their trip out to sea...

programme.title: Never Trust A Snake
programme.desc: After the Fangpyres join forces with the Hypnobrai, Lloyd awakens Pythor – the last remaining snake of the Anacondrai tribe. Pythor lures Lloyd under his spell and steals a map from him that will show him where the remaining two snakes tribes dwell and Uncle Sensei saves Lloyd from doom.

programme.title: The Knights Code
programme.desc: Jestro uses the Book of Chaos to unleash, um, chaos and attack the King's hover train to try and kidnap the royal party. Can the NEXO-Knights bring order out of the chaos and save the King? Jestro finds the Book of Chaos in the countryside and decides he must feed it to the book. The Book of Monsters actually tells Jestro NOT to feed it to him he tells Jestro he's not ready for that kind of power. But Jestro doesn't listen. Now the Book unleashes chaotic monsters and Jestro uses them to attack the King and his party who are on a business-related tour of the kingdom. When the NEXO-Knights show up to stop the monster attacks and realize that they must save King and Queen Halbert – Macy's parents – from the chaotic evil monsters that have been unleashed. Clay asserts himself as leader and brings order to the knights from the chaos. He has his own book: the Book of the Knight's Code. They should all live by it.

programme.title: Country Girls
programme.desc: When the girls go to Mia's grandparents' ranch and Olivia accidentally knocks down the neighbor's barn, the girls promise to raise money to rebuild it and now have to learn to set aside their differences and work together to make good on their promise. Mia invites her friends to her grandparents' ranch for the weekend. But when Olivia accidentally knocks down a neighbor's barn with a tractor, the girls promise to raise the money to rebuild it themselves. Complicating matters, Mia and Stephanie turn out to like the same boy, Martin. They'll have to learn to set aside their differences and work together if they're going to raise enough money to make good on their promise.

programme.title: The Snake King
programme.desc: Pythor declares himself to be the destined leader who will reawaken The Great Devourer – an ancient beast who can't be killed and will consume all of Ninjago. We find out Nya is the Samurai and Lloyd is taken prisoner by the snake tribes.

programme.title: Fright Knight
programme.desc: Using the Book of Fear, Jestro calls forth Whipperella and uses her to trap the knights in the dark woods where they realize their darkest fears. Searching through the dark forests of the realm, Jestro finds “The Book of Fear.” It's pretty scary. But he feeds it to the book of Book of Monsters, and he uses it to call forth WHIPPERELLA, a monster that can induce fear. One-by-one she uses her “knighmarish” power on the knights and they experiences their own worst fears. Clay fears not living up to the Knights' Code. Lance fears being a nobody. Macy fears never being a knight and Axl fears having no food. Aaron must take the lead because he's fearless he does everything with reckless abandon. It's not until he leads the group out of the forest – as they fight off the Whipperella – that they we find out Aaron's true fear – the fear of peace and quiet and no more challenges or high energy escapades.

programme.desc: A group of Freedom Fighters is obliterated by a swarm of metallic fly-bots. When Manic goes looking for the insects, he is stung with serum.

programme.desc: A speed enhancing fluid deemed Sonic Tonic is created by Robotnik to make him as fast as Sonic so that he may finally catch him.

programme.desc: Sonic and Tails help out an Owl/Chilidog Diner owner, named Bert Whoo, when Robotnik uses his henchbots to try to collect protection money. When the henchbots prove to be no match for Sonic.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Robotnik puts a meteor on a collision course with a village, Sonic is forced to compete in the Robolympics to save the village. After a series of wild, booby trapped events, Sonic is victorious.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When outlaws chase a sheriff out of a western town, Sonic takes over. But the outlaws are robots built by Robotnik. And when they capture a pretty possum of a saloon girl, Sonic meets Robotnik for a showdown.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: First in a four-part Time Travel series. Robotnik invents a time machine to go back in time and gather four powerful gemstones. His first attempt is on the high seas, but Sonic goes into hyper-Sonic-overdrive, and reverses time to go after him. ...

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Eli's got a new slug recruit! But in the heat of battle, can this rookie go from frightened novice to the hero of the day?

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Dr. Blakk and his Darkbane minions have discovered a way to make their ghouls faster and stronger - giving them an edge over the Shane Gang. In order to even the odds, Eli is going to need his most powerful slugs and an upgraded blaster from Redhook. The only problem is, Dr. Blakk already has the slingersmith working for him... Eli and the gang attempt a daring rescue mission to free Redhook, but along the way discover Blakk has a much more sinister plan in the works.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Dr. Blakk has succeeded in creating a gap in the magical slug-energy barrier that protects Slugterra, opening the way for the evil Darkbane to tunnel their way up from the Deep Caverns. Eli and the Shane gang must stop this at any cost. Now armed with a selection of upgraded slugs, blasters and armor, they take the battle to Dr. Blakk's front door. While his team slugs it out against Dr. Blakk's minions, Eli takes on Blakk himself once and for all!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Eli and the Shane Gang have vanquished Dr. Blakk. But a new threat emerges from beyond the 99 caverns.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Dark Slinger and his marauders have invaded Slugterra! But there's more to this new threat than meets the eye. Eli must fight a very different kind of duel to save Slugterra...and himself.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: A new member joins the Shane Gang! His name is Junjie, and he is a master of the mysterious slugslinging art of Slug Fu. But even with the power of five slingers, the Shane Gang find themselves in over their heads trying to protect the ancient Elemental Slugs.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang and Junjie race across the 99 caverns to keep the Elemental Slugs out of the hands of the Goon.

programme.title: Slugterra

programme.title: Slugterra

programme.title: Slugterra

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Eli and the Gang find a way to take Junjie back home to the Eastern Caverns-and find a whole bunch of trouble waiting for them when they get there!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Upon returning to the Outlaws' jungle camp, the Shane Gang suffer a sneak attack from the Emperor's Underlord Holt, who steals almost all of their slugs and loads them onto the Dragon Train for transport to the Emperor. With precious few slugs to use as ammo, the Shane Gang must be extra resourceful to get them back.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: In order to reach the Emperor of the Eastern Caverns, Eli and Junjie pose as Underlords to enter the Tournament of Underlords.

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: In a climactic battle, Junjie and Eli confront the Emperor and the Dai-Fu as the fate of the entire Eastern Caverns hangs in the balance!

programme.title: It's A Crazy, Crazy World
programme.desc: The Winx decide to go back to Alfea with their Fairy Animals: in order to catch them, Kalshara has to find a way to enter the school for fairies. But, suddenly, the Winx are called by Roxy for an emergency: the weather in Ethiopia has gone crazy, threatening the cranes that migrated over there. Together with the Pixies, the six fairies get to Ethiopia, but then they have to use their Tynix power to enter the Sundial MiniWorld and sort things out. Before going back home, the Winx find a little Digmole that says it's searching for its own fairy, Faragonda!

programme.title: The Kingdom Of Diamonds -Winx Club
programme.desc: The Digmole the Winx show to Faragonda says it's bonded with the Alfea headmistress, but Faragonda has vague memories about it. Bloom explains that this could be due to the fact that the previous headmistress, Mavilla, cancelled all the memories of the Alfea fairies about the Fairy Animals. As they are speaking, Bloom has an intuition: she realizes that the animal with the First Colour of the Universe is the small statue representing a Digmole taken by Faragonda in the past as it is made of diamond, it reflects all the colours of light. The Winx shrink to enter the Adamantine MiniWorld and there they find a diamond that has the Ultimate Power, but a sudden collapse of the orchard-greenhouse buries Flora under a pile of rocks…

programme.title: Blippi Visits Kennedy Space Center
programme.desc: Blippi visits the Kennedy Space Center and learns about space!

programme.title: The Berry Bitty Great Race
programme.desc: Apple isn't paying attention when Strawberry describes their campout tradition of telling "Tall Tales." So Apple tells her thrilling adventure of a wild road rally she entered, only to surprise the girls by proving the story is actually true.

programme.title: The Berry Best Taste Test
programme.desc: Apple's rave review on her berryweb page of Strawberry's new dessert starts a booming mail order dessert business for Berry Bitty City. When Strawberry's stuffed-up nose makes her bake a bad-tasting cake, Apple, afraid the truth will hurt Strawberry's reputation, proclaims it's delicious. The fib snowballs when the Queen of Berryvania reads Apple's review and orders Strawberry's new cake for her ball. A madcap chase ensues as Apple tries to stop the airmail postal bees from delivering the cake.

programme.title: Foods that Smell
programme.desc: Lily and Avery follow their noses to find out what gives foods their amazing aromas. Avery enjoys a super garlicky Caesar salad, and then tries to sniff out a cure for his ghastly garlic breath. Lily makes a splash at the fish market where she gets to the bottom of seafood's suspicious smells. Together, they take on the ultimate olfactory challenge: recreating Matt's Amazing Seafood Chowder, by sense of smell alone!

programme.title: Foods that Melt
programme.desc: Watch foods melt before your eyes! Chill out as Lily tries to solve the mystery behind Baked Alaska, a frozen dessert that doesn't melt in the oven. Onthe hunt for a simple snack, Avery visits a local cheese shop and discovers there's moreto cheese than just cheddar! Back at the kitchen with Matt, Lily and Avery use a varietyof cheeses and fresh veggiesto see who can make thebest twist on an ooey-gooey melted favourite: grilled cheese sandwiches!

programme.title: Painting By Magic, The Princess's Ball, A trick for Thunder Girl

EP30: With the help of a magic wand and a magic hat, Rigolini plays magicians in Wonderland.

programme.title: Anoki's Igloo, Fish, Lemons and Gherkins, An Exciting Fishing Trip

His friends want to help him lay down the roof but it's so heavy that only Super Hero is strong enough to carry it! EP32: Tijinou and Tijibelle are greeted by Anoki and Super Hero. Our friends have brought a basket full of food: honey for Bianca the little Bear, yellow for Anoki, and chicory and pickles for Dylan l'Élan, who just loves that! Mmm… EP33: When Tijinou and Tijibelle arrive on the ice, they hear laughter and joyous yelping!… It's Hot Dog the puppy playing with Bianca the little Bear around a picnic basket. But Anoki asks Tijinou and Tijibelle to deal with it because he promised Thunder Fairy to teach him to fish on the ice.

programme.title: Blippi's Summer Sleepover at the Zoo

Miraculously, they emerge best buds, and their friends are relieved, until Sour's influence on Apple turns her into a mini-Sour, and they have to do a personality "makeover" on Apple.

programme.title: Hot Sauce Cook Off

programme.title: The Secret Of Alfea -Winx Club
programme.desc: The Fairy Animals arrive to save Flora and the Winx, magically appearing in the Adamantine MiniWorld. For the Winx there is no time to waste, because, in the meantime, the Ultimate Power Diamond has flown out of the MiniWorld, looking for a keeper… and it has been taken by Kalshara first and then by Brafilius, who has absorbed it, summoning the most powerful magic animals in all the dimensions. In doing so, he has also freed the Trix, who easily turn Brafilius into a dog and force Kalshara to flee. Stronger than ever, the Trix use the Ultimate Power to besiege Alfea. Therefore, the Winx have to enter the Alfea MiniWorld to strengthen the magic source of the college, but on their way they bump once again into the Trix, who throw that fairy place into the dark…

programme.title: The Golden Butterfly -Winx Club

The Winx meet Mavilla and young Faragonda, asking them to help them finding the Golden Butterfly, the only animal that can give light and energy again to the Heart of Alfea. Thanks to the Tynix power, the Winx enter the Flower MiniWorld bumping into the Trix, on the back of their magic animals: now, with the Ultimate Power in their hands, they can travel to any place linked to the Fairy Animals. programme.title: Rainbow Ruby

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby

programme.title: Rainbow Ruby
programme.desc: Ruby is looking at shoes that are now too small for her but she is unwilling to throw away. Ling Ling is worried about Thunderbell. programme.title: Rainbow Ruby

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev finds out that Bo wants to be a Police Kid, he tells a white lie to make him one for a day! Officer Bo takes the new job too far, ticketing everyone-for everything. Rev will have to tell the truth to fix this mess and get his friend back! // At Camp Sleepaway, Bo is homesick. His friends try to lift his spirits, but after a stinky trip to the outhouse, he's had enough! That is...until a suggestion from Rev helps Bo to see the beauty all around. Maybe camp isn't so bad after all!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev hears a snowstorm is coming, he starts building the best winter track ever! One problem...Rev is sick. No matter what his friends say, they can't keep him away. Eventually he'll need to admit the best way for him to help is to go home and rest. // When Rev and Avery investigate veggie-rustling rabbits, they form a posse to run them out of town. The Cowboy Kids track down the thieving rabbits and discover they have babies! Now the posse will need to help the rabbits find a better way to feed.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: At band practice, Rumble struggles to control his nervous backfiring, even damaging the instruments by accident! Determined not to give up on the festival, the gang improvises and uses makeshift instruments. They even feature Rumble's nervous twitch! // When Rev and Owen begrudgingly agree to join Bo's First Aid Games, they do everything BUT take the lessons seriously. It isn't long before the boys find out that first aid isn't all fun and games, but it IS totally awesome!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Bo messes up on a few rescue missions, he decides to quit Bo's Rescue Hotline. Wanting to help their friend, the gang creates fake emergencies for Bo to solve. But as the friends find out, it takes more than trickery to build self-confidence! // As a heatwave hits Fender Bend, Rev and his friends look forward to Ice Cream Dream Day! But when the ice cream truck breaks down, it's up to the gang to find a way to deliver the tasty treats before they all melt.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev, Rumble and their friends help capture a group of wayward llamas, they each try and claim sole credit for the round up. Rev's parents listen patiently to the elaborate tales, each one starring a different hero, before ruling it a team effort! // When Avery creates a magnetic modification for Rumble, it seems to be the perfect solution. Now Rumble can help them tidy up the Gear Up Garage! But things get complicated when Rumble turns into a super-magnet, attracting all kinds of metal debris!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev wants to surprise his friends with a movie celebrating their friendship, so he secretly gathers footage to show they're the best friends ever. When Avery realizes what he's up to, she adds her own clips to the movie - surprising Rev as well! // Owen hosts a virtual review of the gang's adventures with Rev and Rumble, plus all of their awesome gear! He walks his viewers through some of their most memorable moments, from mega stunts to monsters to rescue missions.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: After many years of working hard on Accelerator Acres, Tilly the tractor is ready to retire from ranch life. Rev wants to find her the perfect new job, but his ideas are too intense for old Tilly. He'll have to adjust to her slower pace first. // Rev and the gang compete for the title of Best Prankster-except Lori sits out, claiming pranks aren't her thing. After a full day of pranks and laughs, the kids gather for the big party that Lori planned for them...but all is not as it seems!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: As Rev and Avery compete to see who can be the best helper, they accidentally work against each other and end up making things more complicated for those they // Rev thinks Avery is moving away! Upset, he leads an all-out effort to convince her to stay, showing her that Fender Bend is the best place to live-despite Avery's protests that she's too busy. Finally, Avery confronts their strange behaviour.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev is sure he has the perfect plan to catch an elusive frog, but Avery isn't so sure. After all of his attempts fall through, he's finally ready to accept help-and Avery's idea just might work! Will they finally catch the Green Phantom? // Rev and Avery compete to transport supplies to town for a big event. Avery is faster, so Rev tries to take a short cut to get ahead-but an obstacle stops him in his tracks. How will he finish his delivery in time, let alone win the competition?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Avery go on an adventure to discover the Crystal Cavern. As they enter the first cave, a swarm of bats scare Rumble so much, he takes off through a maze of tunnels! They can't worry about the Crystal Cavern-they have to find Rumble first! // When Molly tells a campfire story about the Fender Bend Beast, the kids' imaginations run wild. Covered in goop and debris, Rumble scares them into thinking he's the Beast! Avery hatches a plan to trap the "Beast" and save Rumble, who's gone missing

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: After a snowstorm, Rev and Avery compete for title of Champion of the Winter Bestival! Avery is determined to hold her title from last year. Rev's Dad suggests a "slow and steady" approach to win, but Rev can't resist using "Rumble power!" // When Rumble wakes Rev in the middle of the night, they hear a strange sound, and see lights in the forest. The next day, Ben encourages them to investigate further. Rev and his friends follow the trail of missing trees to discover the truth!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When damage from a storm threatens to cancel the Wild Wheelin' Stunt Park Skills Contest, Owen is disappointed he won't get to compete. Rev leads the kids in the Stunt Park clean-up, and soon discovers that this is really an opportunity in disguise! // Rev and the gang make their own castle and play as knights of old. But when their sticks and building supplies begin to disappear, Bo leads them into a medieval battle of wits with the culprit-a cranky beaver!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rumble cracks his mirror, he thinks it gave him bad luck, and his confidence takes a hit. Even after Rev fixes the mirror and bolsters his pal, the bad luck continues. But when danger strikes, can Rumble regain his self-esteem and save the day? // When Rev hears about a vehicle long jump contest, he dreams of fame and victory. But even with a grueling training plan from coaches Avery and Alley, the record-breaking jump seems out of reach...until Alley ends up in danger and needs their help!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When Rev offers to help look after a rambunctious puppy, Rumble gets jealous of all the attention he gets. And much to his annoyance, while Rev and Avery try everything to teach the pup new tricks (with no success), it only has eyes for Rumble! // When Rev tries to teach Rumble to swim with his special inflated tires, Rumble keeps sinking to the bottom of the pond. Ben and Molly suggest they get advice from Gilly, the old Fender Bend ferry pilot.

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: When a game of Bumper Ball gets a little too heated, the friends start competing against their own teammates! But when a stray ball knocks open the sheep pen, they'll have to learn to work together to round up the sheep...and get back to the game! // Rev and his friends receive a map in pieces, so they race up separate mountain trails, vying to be first to claim the treasure at the top. But when there's no treasure in sight at the end, Rev's parents have some advice for finding the real reward.

programme.title: Collin Moulton
programme.desc: Collin is one of the most fun, personable, and sought after headliners today. He has had his own stand-up special on SHOWTIME, he's been on NICKELODEON, and was recently featured on LAST CALL WITH CARSON DALY. Touring for over 15 years Collin has gained an ease and enjoyment on stage that makes every show worth watching.America knows and loves him. His familiarity and energy engages and relieves the audience before he even speaks. His electric storytelling style makes you care about every topic he explores. Collin's comedy is the release needed from our every day lives. Come needing to laugh tonight, leave wanting to laugh forever!Collin Moulton

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Following his groundbreaking win on NBC's Last Comic Standing in 2006, Josh Blue has risen through the ranks to become a well-established headliner at venues throughout the world.

programme.title: Andy Beningo
programme.desc: Over the past decade, Andy Beningo has established himself as one of the hardest working comedians in the business. Performing his clever, "every man" material has led to some 2,700 career performances. Along the way, he has appeared on AXS Gotham Comedy Live, as a final four finalist on CMT's Next Big Comic, and on the Bob and Tom radio show. Beningo's new CD regularly plays on Laugh USA on XM Sirius Radio. He's been hailed for his clean comedy, and was named one of the 40 Best Up and Coming Comedians in the country. He was also named "Best Comedian" by both the Detroit Metro Times and Detroit Hour magazine.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: San Diego native Jesse Egan jokes about hitting on women in a smart car, hippie drive-bys, and the gluten free craze.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy

She performs stand-up comedy, has appeared on Tough Crowd with Colin Quinn, and is a former co-host (with Neil deGrasse Tyson) of the Star Talk Radio podcast As of April 2020, Lord became a co-host for Center for Inquiry's Point of Inquiry podcast

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.sub-title: Steve Hofstetter: A Trip to Japan
programme.desc: Often called the "hardest working man in show-business", Steve Hofstetter covers everything from paper decapitations in plane crashes to seeing-eye children.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Chris Cope, a Florida transplant now living in LA. The city has been good to Chris in just 4 short years he's appeared on Jimmy Kimmel Live, Tosh.O, Laughs on Fox. He's acted in feature films and also appeared on the hit ABC TV Show "Grey's Anatomy".

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Brad Trackman is a national touring comedian who has been featured on a number of well-known comedy shows and channels.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy
programme.desc: Proud smart aleck Robert G. Lee jokes about performing in a prison, Millennial baseball, and over-protective parents.

programme.title: Bengt Washburn
programme.desc: Bengt Washburn is an Aquarius with Hazel eyes who prefers boxer briefs, solid deodorants, and Crest toothpaste. He is 5'9? tall, weighs about 149 pounds and can bench 150 pounds three times without a spotter. He has a vertical leap of 16 inches. 8 years ago a lump appeared on his right thigh. It's not visible from the stage but according to some kids at the water park, it looks creepy. Many people say Bengt looks kind of like a monkey. Bengt Washburn was born in Salt Lake City, Utah but grew up in a large Utah town (1,200 people) as the fifth child in a small Mormon family (7 children). Bengt is married to an officer in the United States Airforce. They have lived in 6 different cities over the last eleven years. Most recently he moved to Springfield, Virginia (Washington D.C.) after living in Stuttgart, Germany for 3 years. Bengt is a former winner of the prestigious San Francisco International Comedy Competition. He has been seen on The Late Late Show with Craig Fergusen, Live at Gotham on Comedy Central and most recently Conan on TBS. He was invited to perform at the Vancouver International Comedy Festival, The Boston Comedy Festival, the Aspen Laff Festival and Gilda's Laugh Fest in Grand Rapids, Michigan. He's been heard on NPR, PRI and Bob and Tom. All three of his comedy Cd's can be heard playing on XM Sirius radio. Most people who know him would say Bengt is a logistically impaired ditz, but his comedy is described as intelligent, surprisingly universal considering the content matter and profoundly funny.

programme.desc: An FBI Agent seeks vengeance on a mysterious assassin known as "Rogue" who murdered his partner.

programme.desc: A deadly assassin (Sam Worthington) is marked for death when he can't bring himself to kill a young woman.

programme.title: Dangerous
programme.desc: A reformed sociopath fights to uncover the truth behind his brother's death.

programme.title: Rob the Mob
programme.desc: A Queens couple who specialize in robbing Mafia social clubs stumble upon their biggest score and become targets of the mob and the FBI. Starring Andy Garcia, Ray Romano and Michael Pitt.

programme.title: Hollow Creek
programme.desc: Trying to find inspiration for his next horror novel, Blake retreats to the Appalachian Mountains with his mistress, Angelica. When she disappears, Blake becomes a prime suspect.

programme.title: Alone for Christmas
programme.desc: When a family visits grandma's house on Christmas Eve, they leave their dog at home alone. When burglars try to take the presents from under the tree, the dog must use every trick it knows to stop them. With Kevin Sorbo.

programme.title: Ivy & Mistletoe
programme.desc: A woman is determined to get home for Christmas but finds herself stranded in a small town during a snowstorm.

programme.title: Christmas Crash
programme.desc: A couple on the brink of divorce crash their private plane into the woods and are presumed dead. With the help of their children they are rescued and discover that the was not an accident.

programme.title: Riddles of the Sphinx
programme.desc: An astronomer and a cryptographer uncover a series of ancient tunnels, unwittingly unleashing a deadly Sphinx. In order to trap the Sphinx back in its tomb and stop impending destruction, our explorers must solve a series of complicated and possibly deadly riddles.

programme.title: Becoming Ms. Bennett: Pride & Prejudice
programme.desc: A popular American vlogger is cast in a British film production of 'Pride and Prejudice', but struggles with her accent.

programme.title: FBI: Negotiator
programme.desc: An FBI agent must negotiate with a woman holding a hospital hostage in order to get her hands on an experimental drug.

programme.title: Sonic The Hedgehog
programme.desc: The world needed a hero, we got a hedgehog. Superpowered with speed, Sonic races to save the world and stop evil genius Dr. Robotnik from world domination. Jim Carrey, Ben Schwartz and James Marsden star in the adventure the whole family will enjoy.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark Of The Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet. Sam Witwicky and the Autobots must fight against the darkness to defend our world from the Decepticons.

programme.title: ParaNorman
programme.desc: Norman Babcock finds his paranormal abilities pushed to their limits to take on zombies and ghosts, and save his town from a centuries-old curse.

programme.title: The African Queen
programme.desc: A timeless tale of two mismatched strangers joining forces in a common cause - and finding love along the way. The story chronicles the burgeoning romance as they reluctantly join forces to torpedo a German gunboat in war-torn East Africa.

programme.title: Donovans Reef
programme.desc: Acclaimed director John Ford and screen legend John Wayne team up for what would be their final collaboration in this boisterous, rowdy South Seas escapade.

programme.title: The Fighting Seabees
programme.desc: The construction foreman of a fighting work battalion to be stationed near Japanese lines in the Pacific and a naval commander colleague compete in Washington for a journalist, while preparing to engage the enemy in a massive assault.

programme.title: Kill Switch
programme.desc: A psychopathic killer is ravaging Memphis, Tennesse by murdering young women and Detective Jacob Stillwell is on the case. Known as the resident tough cop due to his aggressive tactics, he gets knocked sideways when his girlfriend becomes one of the murder victims. With his partner, Storm Anderson, in tow, Jacob casts the rules aside and infiltrates the seedy criminal underworld of the city looking to avenge his lover's death and put an end to the killings.

programme.title: Nature Unleashed: Tornado
programme.desc: A huge tornado endangers the lives of a journalist (Ruth Platt) and a town of Gypsies.

programme.title: Spiders 3D
programme.desc: A space shuttle crashes into a New York City subway tunnel, releasing a bloodthirsty army of mutated spiders.

programme.title: The Alternate
programme.desc: The president is kidnapped while attending a charity event. Initially planned by his chief of staff to boost his poll ratings, one of the kidnappers decides the opportunity for gain is too strong and it turns into a real kidnapping. Starring Ice-T.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: Jason Statham stars as a tough cop who's dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers. Also featuring Paddy Considine and Aidan Gillen.

programme.title: Chicago 10
programme.desc: Archival footage, animation, and music are used to look back at the eight anti-war protesters who were put on trial following the 1968 Democratic National Convention.

programme.title: In Football We Trust
programme.desc: In Football We Trust intimately follows four young Polynesian football players struggling to overcome gang violence, family pressure and poverty as they enter the high stakes world of college recruiting and the promise of professional sports.

programme.title: Murderous Minds: Dennis Nilsen
programme.desc: Dennis Andrew Nilsen was a Scottish serial killer and necrophile who murdered at least twelve young men and boys between 1978 and 1983 in London.

programme.title: Killed Walking Home
programme.desc: This documentary explores the lives of three different women who have been killed walking home.

programme.title: The Act Of Killing (Director's Cut)
programme.desc: One of the greatest documentaries ever made, filmmaker Joshua Oppenheimer and documentary titans, Werner Herzog and Errol Morris examine a country where Indonesian death squad leaders are celebrated as heroes, challenging them to reenact their real-life mass-killings via musical numbers, action and comedy sequences and other genres of the American movies they love.

programme.title: Tainted Waters
programme.desc: An unknowingly selfish mechanic, unable to financially save his failing business, agrees to take part in a four man robbery. Now hiding out from the cops, he has to make it through the night in a room of people where he's not the most selfish.

programme.title: Out of Gas
programme.desc: Two married couples set out to go on a trip to a marriage retreat to enhance their marriage, but is faced with dark evil along the way. As darkness falls upon them, secrets are revealed. Trust is no longer among them and what was supposed to be a moment of beautiful memories becomes a nightmare.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A group of kids stumble across something unfamiliar, and have no idea of the adventure that awaits them. When the games begin the eye chooses its course.

programme.title: The Lyric
programme.desc: An aspiring singer discovers the lyrics in a song written for her could lead her to the killer of the writer who wrote it.

programme.title: The Christmas Dance
programme.desc: Traumatized by her past Christmas is not at the top of Sarahs list this time of year. However, waltzing through lifes unexpected emergencies, she is taught the Christmas dance.

programme.title: Cupid's Christmas
programme.desc: As Santa Claus searches for his lost Reindeer the love story of Katie Luke is re-ignited.

programme.title: Christmas Break In
programme.desc: Christmas Break-In is the story of Izzy, a spunky nine year-old who gets left at school on the last day before Christmas break. While her parents brave a blizzard to reach her, three bumbling crooks break into the school to hide out until the heat dies down. But when they take the school janitor hostage, Izzy will have to find a way to save him and teach the crooks a lesson.

programme.title: Santa Girl
programme.desc: Santa Claus' only daughter wants to experience the "real world" before she must marry the son of Jack Frost, a boy she has never met, and take over the family business. Along with her trusty elf, Cassie Claus sets off to college while trying to keep her magic powers and famous father a secret. At school Cassie is pursued by two boys: Sam, sweetly awkward and J.R., handsome and wealthy. As her impending arranged marriage looms, Cassie struggles with her feelings for Sam and her obligation to her father and Christmas.

programme.title: Divorce American Style
programme.desc: About a nouveau-riche Los Angeles couple who, after 17 years of marriage, decide to call it quits.

programme.title: Autumn Leaves
programme.desc: A middle aged woman's romance with a man half her age becomes a nightmare when his past comes back to haunt them both.

programme.title: Bell, Book And Candle
programme.desc: A modern-day witch likes her neighbor but despises his fiancee, so she enchants him to love her instead... only to fall in love with him for real.

programme.title: Counter-Espionage
programme.desc: The Lone Wolf tracks down Nazi spies in London during the German bombing.

programme.title: Passions
programme.desc: A man with a wife and daughter also has a son with another woman. When he dies this little secret is revealed to the wife.

programme.title: Modern Romance
programme.desc: A story of modern careers, modern sporting goods, modern filmmaking... and an ancient war--the battle of the sexes. Edited for TV

programme.title: The Man Who Loved Women
programme.desc: A charming and romantic comedy about a man who never met a woman he couldn't love. Edited for TV

programme.title: The Competition
programme.desc: In a world where winning means survival, they broke the only rule... they fell in love.

programme.title: Major Dundee
programme.desc: A Union officer in charge of a jail in the Southwest enlists prisoners to fight against renegade Apaches.

programme.title: Law Of The Canyon
programme.desc: In the opening scene of this fine "Durango Kid" series entry, wannabe general store owner Steve Langtry (Charles Starrett) is robbed, wounded, and left for dead at Skeleton Pass by a gang of thugs. Rescued by prospector Smiley Burnette and brought to nearby Jackson City, Steve receives a ransom note demanding two thousand dollars for the return of his wagons. But instead of paying the ransom, as suggested by Dr. Middleton (Fred F. Sears), Steve dons the disguise of the Durango Kid, much to the excitement of Spike (Buzz Henry), Sheriff Coleman's (George Chesebro) impressionable son. In contrast, Steve without the disguise is considered a coward by all and sundry, especially the sheriff's pretty daughter Mary (Nancy Saunders). Our hero, of course, is in reality a secret agent and with the help of young Spike and Smiley, the leader of the gang of thugs is soon apprehended. In between the gunplay and fisticuffs, Texas Jim Lewis and his Lone Star Cowboys perform "I'm Riding the Trail Back Home" and "Way Back in Grandpa's Day," while in his inimitable way Smiley Burnette takes care of his own "Huntin' Trouble" and "With My Luck."

programme.title: Blackjack Ketchum, Desperado

programme.title: Hour of the Gun
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: Billy Two Hats

programme.title: The Way West
programme.desc: Icons Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum and Richard Widmark star in this sumptuous, epic tale of the brave men and women in the U.S. who left the comfort and safety of life in the East for the promise of free land a better life in the untamed West.

programme.title: I'M LIVE: S1 E303
programme.desc: Joining us on this week's episode of I'm LIVE is the band 87dance! 87dance is composed of vocalist and producer BETHEBLUE, guitarist Park Seong-ho, drummer Lee Jung-yeol, and bassist Choi Jun-young. This quartet made its debut in 2019 with its self-titled EP, “Palchilldance,” and quickly made itself known to the public with its unique soundscapes and fashion styles. They are now expanding their reach beyond Korea, being selected for UP NEXT KOREA by Apple Music and SPOTIFY FRESH FINDS. In this episode, 87dance performs “How can i forget you girl,” “even if fall into a fail,” “love in balcony,” “YOU'RE MY CAKE,” and more. Tune in to I'm LIVE and meet 87dance!

programme.title: Lady Gaga
programme.desc: Lady Gaga's performance at the iTunes Festival in London on September 1, 2013 marks the superstar's first full concert since the The Born This Way Ball. It is an eight song set containing the world premiere of seven tracks from her fourth album, ARTPOP: "Aura" "MANiCURE" "Artpop" "Jewels N' Drugs" ft. T.I., Too $hort and Twista "Sexxx Dreams", "Swine" and "I Wanna Be With You", a song that transformed into "Dope" for ARTPOP. During the concert, captured stunningly in HD, Gaga says that she's "a bit like Dorothy right now." The stage is her Kansas, the crowd is her family, and their reunion is pure magic. Lady Gaga, her dancers, and her band traverse through visual and musical themes of love, sex, violence, beauty, danger, empowerment, hustle, lust, and above all ART. Throughout, Gaga lays her heart bare for the audience and the cameras with every note sung and every word spoken.

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 69

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 70
programme.desc: Refugio le reclama a Teresa haberse acostado con Mariano sin haber estado casada. Arturo intenta pedirle perdón a Teresa pero ella lo rechaza. Para que lo perdone, Arturo vuelve a Teresa su socia en el despacho.

programme.title: Teresa Capítulo 71
programme.desc: Teresa le pide a Arturo esperar un poco para tener un hijo. El papá de Aurora duda en decirle la verdad sobre el paradero de su madre. Aída y Mariano deciden dejar fluir su relación.

programme.title: Tres Veces Ana Capítulo 72
programme.desc: Ana Laura corrobora que Ana Leticia también soñó con el accidente de sus padres. Ramiro forcejea con sus captores, llega Marcelo y lo libera. Marcelo le asegura a Ana Leticia que recuerda que ella no quería que él encontrara a Ana Lucía.

programme.title: María la del Barrio Capítulo 42
programme.desc: Tita hace un plan para separar a Nandito de su mamá y le propone a su papá a irse a Europa durante dos meses, María se rehúsa a viajar con ellos. María le pide a Tita que deje de meterle malos pensamientos a Luis Fernando.

programme.title: María Mercedes Capítulo 19
programme.desc: Malvina se escabulle en la habitación de Santiago y encuentra un dinero escondido. Jorge Luis confiesa que pese a todo no puede odiar a María Mercedes.

programme.title: María Mercedes Capítulo 20
programme.desc: El licenciado le entrega una libreta de ahorro a María Mercedes con la que podrá obtener dinero. Malvina piensa darse una vida llena de lujos y comodidades.

programme.title: Marimar Capítulo 31
programme.desc: Marimar se encuentra con Sergio en el elevador y lo trata muy mal. Rodolfo San Genis intenta comprar a Marimar con sus regalos, pero ella lo rechaza.

programme.title: María la del Barrio Capítulo 41
programme.desc: Tita conoce a Nandito y comienza su venganza contra María preguntándole sobre la señora que lo protege. Luis Fernando le reprocha a Tita su comportamiento contra su madre. María se niega a decir la verdad hasta que Nandito esté mejor educado.

programme.title: María la del Barrio Capítulo 42
programme.desc: Tita hace un plan para separar a Nandito de su mamá y le propone a su papá a irse a Europa durante dos meses, María se rehúsa a viajar con ellos. María le pide a Tita que deje de meterle malos pensamientos a Luis Fernando.
