programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 65
programme.desc: Victoria se enfrenta a Bernarda y le confiesa que sabe que quemó vivos a Gonzalo y Rosalía. María y Nati echan a Linda de su casa y ella le pide ayuda a Guillermo porque no tiene dónde vivir. Linda le dice a Ximena que María está embarazada.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 66
programme.desc: Linda le dice a Ximena que María está embarazada pero que si quiere saber quién es el padre, tendrá que darle mucho dinero. Linda sorprende a Osvaldo en el apartamento de Pedro. Victoria encuentra a Osvaldo con Linda y los enfrenta.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 67
programme.desc: Max le jura a María que, a pesar de Ximena, nunca la abandonará. Victoria le pide el divorcio a Osvaldo. Bernarda llama a Victoria para amenazarla. Guillermo convence a Ximena de asesinar a Linda por intentar extorsionarlos.

programme.title: Triunfo del Amor Capítulo 68
programme.desc: La policía encuentra un testigo que afirma que Linda fue asesinada. Los fantasmas de sus crímenes persiguen a Bernarda. Una vecina cree haber visto a Juanjo, así que Nati y Max salen a buscarlo y lo encuentran entre los indigentes.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 42
programme.desc: Juan Miguel le dice a Marichuy que esta decepcionado porque ella hablo en su contra. Cecilia cuestiona a Isabela sobre la edad de Estefania. Marichuy es la protagonista de un nuevo programa de TV.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 43
programme.desc: Todos los vecinos ven el programa donde actua Marichuy. Juan Miguel llega a hablar con Marichuy, ella le hace creer que hablo en su contra en el juicio. Todos los vecinos felicitan a Marichuy por su actuacion.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 44
programme.desc: Gabriel corre a Viviana de la casa y esta ve que la situacion se está poniendo peligrosa para ella. Con su primer sueldo, Marichuy le compra unos regalos a Candelaria y le da el resto del dinero para que lo guarde.

programme.title: Cuidado con el Ángel Capítulo 45
programme.desc: Juan Miguel besa a Marichuy por la fuerza. Marichuy le confiesa a Cande que está embarazada. Estefania se molesta y decide irse, Eduardo y Beatriz se van con ella. Juan Miguel obliga a Marichuy a irse con él.

programme.title: Mañana Es Para Siempre Capítulo 41
programme.desc: Fernanda le cuenta a Margarita que Eduardo se suicidó. Eduardo teme que los Elizalde descubran su verdadera identidad. Santiago y Aurora deciden casarse. Bárbara se alegra al saber que la empresa de Gonzalo está en quiebra.

programme.title: Lazos de Amor Capítulo 99
programme.desc: Virginia le dice a María Guadalupe que Nicolás siempre la ha amado a ella. Ana le pide a María Guadalupe que acepte a su verdadera familia.

programme.title: Lazos de Amor Capítulo 100
programme.desc: María Paula intenta matar a toda su familia con tal de que María Guadalupe no sea feliz. María Guadalupe se casa con Nicolás.

programme.title: Lazos de Amor Capítulo 1
programme.desc: María Guadalupe, María Fernanda y María Paula viajan con sus padres a la casa de campo de la familia. María Paula hace que su padre pierda el control del auto provocando un terrible accidente.

programme.title: Mañana Es Para Siempre Capítulo 39
programme.desc: Santiago sufre al saber que Aurora no quiere estar a su lado. Aníbal le pide a Fernanda que convenza a Eduardo de unir su empresa con la de los Elizalde. Damián sospecha que Fernanda sigue enamorada de Eduardo.

programme.title: Mañana Es Para Siempre Capítulo 40
programme.desc: Eduardo le confiesa a Fernanda el gran interés que siente por ella. Santiago le pide a Aurora que se case con él. Vladimir le pide a Priscila que le diga si el hijo que espera es de él.

programme.title: Mañana Es Para Siempre Capítulo 41
programme.desc: Fernanda le cuenta a Margarita que Eduardo se suicidó. Eduardo teme que los Elizalde descubran su verdadera identidad. Santiago y Aurora deciden casarse. Bárbara se alegra al saber que la empresa de Gonzalo está en quiebra.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Frankie le vende una videocasetera a Luis, pero Lorena le recuerda a Frankie que tiene atorado un video muy vergonzoso de ellos. Germán trata de ayudar a Benito para que se le caiga un diente.

programme.title: Vecinos
programme.desc: Germán le pide a los vecinos que le den un aumento de sueldo, pero se lo niegan y decide renunciar. Lorena y Frankie están decididos a hacer todo lo posible para que Benito consiga actuar en un comercial.

programme.title: XH DRBZ
programme.desc: Marco Eugenio Regil estrena el show ‘100 Desempleados Dijeron'. El programa ‘Las 5 Herencias' hace debut en el canal XH DRBZ con Simón Paz y Néstor Guerra como conductores.

programme.title: XH DRBZ
programme.desc: En ‘Medicazos de la Vida Real' la licenciada Pamela Juanjo entrevista a un muy curioso doctor. En ‘Sección Imposible' Sammy y Miguel Luis nos muestran como los mexicanos celebran el 14 de febrero.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 2
programme.desc: Los preparativos de una boda en el Hotel Todo Incluido desencadenan situaciones poco comunes con el personal y los huespedes.

programme.title: Hotel Todo Incluido Capítulo 4
programme.desc: Por culpa de Carmelo, el chef Oropeza renuncia por lo que Jacky busca un chef gourmet para el Hotel Todo Incluido.

programme.title: Nosotros Los Guapos Capítulo 9
programme.desc: Vítor y Albertano se emocionan porque participarán en el juego final de su equipo del barrio y les piden ayuda a Natacha y Cuca para entrenar, pues son muy malos jugadores.

programme.title: Nosotros Los Guapos Capítulo 10
programme.desc: Nacho le regala un vestido a Cuca pero cuando confiesa que era de otra mujer ella se molesta. Albertano decide jugar en otro equipo de fútbol por culpa de Vítor.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: Doña Lucha obliga a sus hijos a seguir la tradición familiar de vender huevos de harina en la feria. María cree que Albertano la va a dejar si no le da una prueba de amor y decide llevarlo a la casa de los sustos para pasar el tiempo solos.

programme.title: María de Todos Los Ángeles
programme.desc: La inauguración de la fonda de Carmelito está en riesgo de ser cancelada debido a que María perdió el permiso de salubridad y arruinó la comida que iban a ofrecer, pero cuando todo parece perdido, Doña Lucha llega para salvar el día.

programme.title: Una familia de diez
programme.desc: Los López descubren que la tía Licha tiene llaves del otro departamento. Ve si lo compartirá con la familia, o se lo quitará el administrador del edificio. Mientras tanto, Plácido consigue trabajo y Plutarco pierde el suyo.

programme.title: Una familia de diez
programme.desc: Renata está harta de que nadie le ayude en los quehaceres de la casa, por lo que decide ya no hacer la limpieza. Averigua cómo quedará el departamento, ahora que se ha liberado.

programme.title: La Familia P. Luche
programme.desc: Ludovico le pide a Don Camerino que sea el padrino de Bibi para que pague su fiesta de XV años. Don Camerino da el dinero para la fiesta pero Ludovico y Federica se lo gastan en otras cosas por lo que improvisan la fiesta.

programme.title: La Familia P. Luche
programme.desc: Ludovico y Federica inscriben a Junior en el concurso 'Niños de Oro', dónde participa cantando opera. El objetivo de Federiva y Ludovico es ganar el gran premio y recuperar lo que han gastado en Junior.

programme.title: Building the Dream
programme.desc: Nashville kitchen and bath designer Richard Anuszkiewicz was determined to take a narrow passageway between the master bedroom and closet and turn it into a retreat. “Everything in this bath is light and bright, so it immediately feels relaxing,” he says. Kitchen-and-bath expert Matthew Quinn starts with what's practical. “I obsess over saving people time—because time equals luxury,” he says. “In this kitchen, I focused on saving steps: from the garage to the fridge, from the dishwasher to the cabinet. It all adds up.”

programme.title: Building the Dream
programme.desc: Imagine building your dream space to not only be beautiful, but do draw you in, activate all of your senses, and make you feel happier from the moment you open the door. This was our goal with this home in Nashville.

programme.title: Christmas At Stately Homes
programme.desc: Celebrate Christmas with the nation's grandest Stately Homes as they throw open their doors to welcome more than a million visitors through the festive season. Exclusive behind the scenes access has been negotiated with aristocrats and staff as they deck their halls with hundreds of Xmas trees, millions of baubles and billions of fairy lights. Tradition runs deep, and each ‘Stately' celebrates Xmas in their own unique way, and the festive season is the key to unlocking a privileged insight into Britain's most famous family homes. All combine the magical ingredients of this special time of the year with enchanting history and access to aristocracy.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati travels to Tucson, Arizona, which claims to have the best 23 miles of Mexican food anywhere in the world. She visits restaurants and meets local chefs to get a deeper understanding of what Mexican food in America truly is. What happens to recipes when they cross the border? How do different cultures connect and shape the food we eat? And what is this Sonoran hot dog everyone is raving about?

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: In Tucson, Pati learns the basics of artisan bread-making from one of America's best bakers, Don Guerra of Barrio Bakery. This experience sets her on a mission to cross into Sonora, Mexico, to see where the Sonoran wheat Don uses for his breads originates. Pati takes what she learned back to her kitchen to create a menu of tasty recipes using wheat flour.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati spends a day in Sonora's capital, Hermosillo, visiting some of the city's best culinary destinations. From gigantic burritos at Doña Guille, to a meat lover's feast with the owner of the popular restaurant Mochomos, mingling with the young crowd at La Ruina brew park, and a treat no trip would be complete without, Sonoran hot dogs, Pati experiences all Hermosillo's food scene has to offer.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati experiences two important Sonoran culinary traditions. First, on the coast in Bahía Kino, local fishermen receive “the blessing” from a woman from the Seri tribe before heading out on the water to catch giant sea scallops. Then, in the mountain town of Matape, Nere, one of Sonora's few female butchers, shares with Pati a tradition called “the benefit” and how she helps feed the community.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati learns that carne asada goes way beyond grilled meat in Sonora. It's an important weekly ritual that brings the whole family together. Back home, Pati throws a carne asada in her backyard for her husband and boys. First, she teaches them the basics of a true Sonoran carne asada. Then, for dessert, a whipped peanut buttercream and grape galette.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Sonoran wheat has shaped the cuisine of the entire Mexican north and is a staple of Sonoran cuisine. Pati tours one of Hermosillo's oldest flour mills and gets a lesson on making coyotas, a traditional dessert, at a local bakery. In her kitchen, Pati shares her take on a classic Sonoran recipe – a carne con chile burrito. Then, she shows us how to make coyotas at home.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati spends a day in the kitchen with her middle son, Sami, cooking recipes inspired by her travels in Sonora that she knows he'll love – beef and potato chimichangas, rice with lentils and caramelized onions, and an avocado and radish salad. In Sonora, Pati sees how the family bond can be the secret to delicious recipes at a famous family run street food stand, Johnny's Tacos in Hermosillo.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Gordon Ramsay hits the road to help struggling restaurants all over the United States turn their luck around. Ramsay examines the problems each establishment faces, from unsanitary refrigerators to lazy or inexperienced staff, and searches for resolutions. With help from his team, Ramsay redecorates each eatery to give it a fresh new look and updates the menu as needed. Ramsay's ultimate goal is to make the restaurants he visits popular and profitable, but it's up to the restaurateurs to take his advice and turn their business nightmare into the American dream.

programme.title: Off the Hitch
programme.desc: In this very special episode of Operation Repo, it's the 36 hours that change everything. When Matt, Froy, and Lyndah go on a routine repo gone violently wrong, the bonds that connect the Pizarro family may be torn apart forever.

programme.title: Matt & Froy Auto Recovery
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia make their way to a home in the hills to clean a germaphobe of his car. Then, it's Matt and Froy's big repo. Having left the company to start their own, they head out after a high-end exotic car from outside a mansion. And finally, Lou, Lyndah, and Lou's cousin Rob drive out to a used car lot to pick up a few cars, but the owner has been hurt by the economy and now he's ready to do the hurting.

programme.title: Win Some, Quarrelsome, Lose Some
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia have an order for a Jaguar behind a retail outlet center, but will the loaders let their precious car be loaded up without a fight? Then, Matt and Froy find themselves amidst a lover's quarrel when a disgruntled wife reveals that she stopped payment on her car because of her cheating husband. And finally, a debtor is nowhere to be found when Lou, Lyndah, and Rob head out to a seemingly quiet neighborhood. The silence is broken when the debtor finally shows up in another vehicle with bang!

programme.title: We Weren't Informed
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy end up on one of the weirdest repo's they've ever encountered when a white cargo van unleashes a wave of workers. Then, Lou, Sonia, and Rob go green when they find they learn the Mercedes Benz they are after has been converted to run on biodiesel. And finally, Matt and Froy can't seem to get a word in edgewise when they encounter a shrieking girl and her biker boyfriend who claim their Mercedes was paid in full. Little do our guys know that she was right all along.

programme.title: Tijuana Surprise
programme.desc: Matt and Froy's business hits another snag when a gang of bat-wielding partiers keeps them away from a car and a paycheck. Then, Lou and Sonia wind up in the crosshairs when they attempt to repo a car from a man who appears to be a federal agent. And, with Matt and Froy's business in a complete shambles, they go to work in the only place that can save them Tijuana.

programme.title: Lyndah's Revenge
programme.desc: Matt and Froy continue their risky run in Tijuana, confronting a strip club owner who keeps a tight grip on his vehicle and his employees. Then, Lou and Cousin Rob are in a case of he said- she said when a seductive young debtor calls in the police with claims of some inappropriate behavior. Finally, the whole Pizarro family heads to an illegal street race to get their just desserts from the man who had previously hit Lyndah with his truck, but at what cost does revenge come?

programme.title: El Prisionero
programme.desc: Lou and his cousin Rob face trouble on the job when a debtor makes shocking claims to police about the newest member of the Pizarro clan. Plus, will a repossession from a well-connected socialite end with Matt and Froy riding into the sunset, or is somebody going to end up locked in a Mexican prison?

programme.title: The Final Showdown
programme.desc: After Froy bails him out from a Tijuana prison, Matt is on the warpath, and somebody needs to pay. Is this just the end of their business, or is it also the end of their friendship? Then, Lou and Sonia get an order for a typical vehicle repossession. There's only one problem: it belongs to somebody who is like family to them.

programme.title: What the Truck?!?
programme.desc: The repo team is back! On the premiere episode of the summer season of Operation Repo, Lou, Matt, Sonia, Froy, and Lyndah are back together and better than ever...although a secret meeting suggests trouble in paradise. This week, the team confronts a shady import/export warehouse filled with unpaid-for cars, a pair of reckless rodeo gals, and a cunning team of car thieves who don't even think twice before running off with the team's truck.

programme.title: Contact
programme.desc: After recovering their stolen truck, the reunited repo team is on pins and needles to hold their shaky alliance together.

programme.title: The Crush
programme.desc: Lou faces the toughest loss of his career. First, the team repossesses a truck from a pair of larger-than-life debtors with a passion for exotic sports, then they grapple with a gaggle of drunken partiers who don't want to give up their tricked-out bus, and, Lou and Matt track a debtor to a junkyard.

programme.title: Daddy's Little Girl
programme.desc: The destruction of the repo team's truck has left the future of the company in the balance, but Matt's got a trick up his sleeve that might keep them afloat. Lou and Sonia head to a dark alley to take a van away from a pair of libidinous teens with a dark secret, Sonia and Froy come face to face with the world's most ornery baker and come away a little worse for wear, and Matt and Froy get in way over their heads when they attempt a repo at a high-octane truck racing track.

programme.title: The Junior Partner
programme.desc: Now that Lou has accepted Matt's offer to buy into the company, the team is back in action, but there are still some unanswered questions. Sonia, Lyndah, and Froy interrupt a rich kid's brunch party to take away his ride, Matt and Lyndah attempt to repo an unusual vehicle from a man who thinks he's Uncle Sam, and Lou and Matt are in a losing match with an unruly gang of jacked-up rugby players.

programme.title: Hard Turns Ahead
programme.desc: Armed with the belief that he is now co-owner of the business, Matt starts making some big business calls - is this the beginning of a new chapter for the team, or the beginning of its undoing?

programme.title: Minutes of Fame
programme.desc: The confusion over Lou's new business relationship with Matt continues to mount. Matt and Froy find themselves in a nice neighborhood on a mission to repossess a security car from the world's most bumbling guards, Sonia, Lyndah, and Matt hit the dock in an effort to reclaim an extremely expensive racing boat from its extremely offensive owner, and Lou, Froy, and Matt go on a mission to the backwoods to snag a total of five cars away from a group of misguided daredevil teenagers.
